v8:item.v8:content: Scheduled job <b>Mail sync</><b> </><b></><b></><b></><b> </><b></> is disabled. <link EnableReceivingAndSendingEmails>Click here to enable</>.
Navigation panel contacts context menu group dynamic list
Contacts context menu group list settings
Topics navigation panel context menu group dynamic list
Topics navigation panel context menu group list settings
Topics navigation panel group reviewed date
List incoming context menu group review topics incoming
Parts of this message have been blocked for your safety. <link EnableUnsafeContent>Click here</> to view the content.
Some mail senders might try to use images and scripts to compromise the security of your device. To protect you from suspicious senders, we block potentially harmful content.

Settings.QueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Ref REFS Document.Meeting THEN CASE WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.DeletionMark THEN 10 ELSE 0 END WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Ref REFS Document.PlannedInteraction THEN CASE WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.DeletionMark THEN 11 ELSE 1 END WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Ref REFS Document.PhoneCall THEN CASE WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.DeletionMark THEN 12 ELSE 2 END WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Ref REFS Document.IncomingEmail THEN CASE WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.DeletionMark THEN 13 ELSE 3 END WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Ref REFS Document.OutgoingEmail THEN CASE WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.DeletionMark THEN 14 ELSE CASE WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.OutgoingEmailStatus = VALUE(Enum.OutgoingEmailStatuses.Draft) THEN 15 WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.OutgoingEmailStatus = VALUE(Enum.OutgoingEmailStatuses.Outgoing) THEN 16 ELSE 4 END END WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Ref REFS Document.SMSMessage THEN CASE WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.DeletionMark THEN 22 ELSE CASE WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.OutgoingEmailStatus = VALUE(Enum.SMSDocumentStatuses.Draft) THEN 17 WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.OutgoingEmailStatus = VALUE(Enum.SMSDocumentStatuses.Outgoing) THEN 18 WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.OutgoingEmailStatus = VALUE(Enum.SMSDocumentStatuses.DeliveryInProgress) THEN 19 WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.OutgoingEmailStatus = VALUE(Enum.SMSDocumentStatuses.PartiallyDelivered) THEN 21 WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.OutgoingEmailStatus = VALUE(Enum.SMSDocumentStatuses.NotDelivered) THEN 23 WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.OutgoingEmailStatus = VALUE(Enum.SMSDocumentStatuses.Delivered) THEN 24 ELSE 17 END END END AS PictureNumber, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Ref, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Date, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.DeletionMark, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Number, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Author, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Incoming, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Subject, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.EmployeeResponsible AS EmployeeResponsible, ISNULL(InteractionsSubjectsOverridable.Reviewed, FALSE) AS Reviewed, ISNULL(InteractionsSubjectsOverridable.ReviewAfter, DATETIME(1,1,1)) AS ReviewAfter, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Attendees, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Type, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.OutgoingEmailStatus, CASE WHEN ISNULL(InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.HasAttachments, FilesExistOverridable.HasFiles) IS NULL THEN FALSE WHEN ISNULL(InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.HasAttachments, FilesExistOverridable.HasFiles) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS HasAttachments, ISNULL(InteractionsSubjectsOverridable.SubjectOf, UNDEFINED) AS SubjectOf, VALUETYPE(InteractionsSubjectsOverridable.SubjectOf) AS SubjectType, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Account, ISNULL(InteractionsSubjectsOverridable.EmailMessageFolder, VALUE(Catalog.EmailMessageFolders.EmptyRef)) AS Folder, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.SentReceived AS SentReceived, CAST(InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Size / 1024 AS NUMBER(10, 2)) AS Size, InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Importance, CASE WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Importance = VALUE(Enum.InteractionImportanceOptions.High) THEN 2 WHEN InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Importance = VALUE(Enum.InteractionImportanceOptions.Low) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ImportancePictureNumber FROM DocumentJournal.Interactions AS InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.InteractionsFolderSubjects AS InteractionsSubjectsOverridable ON InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Ref = InteractionsSubjectsOverridable.Interaction LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.FilesExist AS FilesExistOverridable ON InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Ref = FilesExistOverridable.ObjectWithFiles {WHERE InteractionDocumentsLogOverridable.Ref AS Search}

SELECT DISTINCT InteractionsSubjectsStatesOverridable.SubjectOf AS SubjectOf, InteractionsSubjectsStatesOverridable.NotReviewedInteractionsCount AS NotReviewedInteractionsCount, InteractionsSubjectsStatesOverridable.Running AS Running, InteractionsSubjectsStatesOverridable.LastInteractionDate AS LastInteractionDate, VALUETYPE(InteractionsSubjectsStatesOverridable.SubjectOf) AS SubjectType FROM InformationRegister.InteractionsSubjectsStates AS InteractionsSubjectsStatesOverridable INNER JOIN InformationRegister.InteractionsFolderSubjects AS InteractionsFolderSubjectsOverridable INNER JOIN DocumentJournal.Interactions AS InteractionsOverridable ON InteractionsFolderSubjectsOverridable.Interaction = InteractionsOverridable.Ref ON InteractionsSubjectsStatesOverridable.SubjectOf = InteractionsFolderSubjectsOverridable.SubjectOf {WHERE InteractionsOverridable.EmployeeResponsible, InteractionsOverridable.Type, InteractionsOverridable.Importance, InteractionsOverridable.OutgoingEmailStatus, InteractionsOverridable.Account, InteractionsOverridable.Author, InteractionsOverridable.DeletionMark, InteractionsOverridable.Incoming, InteractionsFolderSubjectsOverridable.Reviewed, InteractionsFolderSubjectsOverridable.ReviewAfter}

SELECT DISTINCT InteractionsContactStatesOverridable.Contact AS Contact, InteractionsContactStatesOverridable.NotReviewedInteractionsCount AS NotReviewedInteractionsCount, InteractionsContactStatesOverridable.LastInteractionDate AS LastInteractionDate, VALUETYPE(InteractionsContactStatesOverridable.Contact) AS ContactType FROM InformationRegister.InteractionsContactStates AS InteractionsContactStatesOverridable {INNER JOIN InformationRegister.InteractionsContacts AS InteractionsContactsOverridable INNER JOIN InformationRegister.InteractionsFolderSubjects AS InteractionsFolderSubjectsOverridable ON InteractionsContactsOverridable.Interaction = InteractionsFolderSubjectsOverridable.Interaction INNER JOIN DocumentJournal.Interactions AS InteractionsOverridable ON InteractionsContactsOverridable.Interaction = InteractionsOverridable.Ref ON InteractionsContactStatesOverridable.Contact = InteractionsContactsOverridable.Contact} {WHERE InteractionsOverridable.EmployeeResponsible, InteractionsOverridable.Type, InteractionsOverridable.Importance, InteractionsOverridable.OutgoingEmailStatus, InteractionsOverridable.Account, InteractionsOverridable.Author, InteractionsOverridable.Incoming, InteractionsFolderSubjectsOverridable.Reviewed, InteractionsFolderSubjectsOverridable.ReviewAfter}

v8:item.v8:content: Move the messages to a folder.
Show all interactions on this topic.
